body_html: I'd like to look into this one. However, I'm not 100% sure, I get the issue completely. I see the duplicate fields and my 1st thought was: Hmm, why not remove the "Application-specific info" in the user profile? (And double-check, everything is then part of the application) But I suppose there is something preventing this?

body: I'd like to look into this one. However, I'm not 100% sure, I get the issue completely. I see the duplicate fields and my 1st thought was: Hmm, why not remove the "Application-specific info" in the user profile? (And double-check, everything is then part of the application) But I suppose there is something preventing this?
